# ENMTools
```{r ENMTools, cache=TRUE}
#ENMTools
gg.enmsp<-enmtools.species()
gg.enmsp$species.name<-"Glaucous-winged Gull"
gg.latlon=cbind(gg.check$long,gg.check$lat)
colnames(gg.latlon)<-c("Longitude","Latitude")
gg.enmsp$presence.points<-gg.latlon
gg.enmsp$background.points<-BG.lonlat
check.species(gg.enmsp)

wg.enmsp<-enmtools.species()
wg.enmsp$species.name<-"Western Gull"
wg.latlon=cbind(wg.check$long,wg.check$lat)
colnames(wg.latlon)=c("Longitude","Latitude")
wg.enmsp$presence.points<-wg.latlon
wg.enmsp$background.points<-BG.lonlat
check.species(wg.enmsp)

hg.enmsp<-enmtools.species()
hg.enmsp$species.name<-"Olympic Gull"
hg.latlon=cbind(hg.check$long,hg.check$lat)
colnames(hg.latlon)=c("Longitude","Latitude")
hg.enmsp$presence.points<-hg.latlon
hg.enmsp$background.points<-BG.lonlat
check.species(hg.enmsp)

```

#Niche Tests
